name: Online Communications
tag_list: business, phone-systems, telephone-systems, online-communications, telecom, suppliers, providers, mitel-uk, panasonic
overview:
Online Communications started offering FREE consultation help and information for businesses within the UK Our motto is quite simple really to offer potential clients the very best in telecoms solutions being it Lines rental packages or to supply business phone systems to small to multi site solutions. Online Communications are very proud to be an Accredited UK suppliers of Mitel UK which are one of the top manufactures of VoIP telecoms solutions providers with in the UK, also we offer Panasonic UK they offer reliable cost-effective small to medium sized phone systems for businesses.

Online Communications are very passionate in helping Doctors Surgeries within their telecom requirements as we know that many medical centres across the UK are experiencing problems with their current phone systems also how they answer patient calls and many more, Mitel offers a brilliant solution which will give you an instant fix also offer you reliable cost-effective solution to help serve your patients expectations.
